p: A portion (300 g) of the dried and compeletly ground aerial parts of D. kotschyi was submitted to water distillation using a Clevenger-type apparatus (British type) for 3 h. The average yield of the extraction was 0.6% w/w according to the dry weight of the sample. The yellow oil of the plant was dried over dry sodium sulfate and stored at +4 Â° C after filtration.
